tests.name: TODO Code Cells Check
tests.run: python -c "import json; import re; nb=json.load(open('tensor_board_tutorial.ipynb')); cells=[c for c in nb['cells'] if c['cell_type']=='code' and any('TODO' in str(s) for s in c.get('source',[]))]; print(f'Found {len(cells)} TODO cells'); [print(f'TODO cell {i} has code: {bool(c.get(\"source\") and any(line.strip() and not line.strip().startswith(\"#\") and \"TODO\" not in line for line in c[\"source\"]))}') for i,c in enumerate(cells)]; exit(0 if all(c.get('source') and any(line.strip() and not line.strip().startswith('#') and 'TODO' not in line for line in c['source']) for c in cells) else 1)"
